item.title: Saltstack - SaltAPI
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Installation Copy 1 yum -y install salt-api Configuration cat /etc/salt/master.d/api.conf #Configure certificates and ports Copy 1 2 3 4 5 rest_cherrypy: port: 8888 debug: True ssl_crt: /etc/pki/tls/certs/localhost.crt ssl_key: /etc/pki/tls/private/localhost_nopass.key cat /etc/salt/master.d/eauth.conf #Set permissions Copy 1 2 3 4 5 6 external_auth: pam: saltapi: - .* - '@wheel' - '@runner' Add an account Copy 1 2 useradd -M -s /sbin/nologin saltapi echo "saltapi_xxxxxx" | passwd saltapi --stdin Start the service Copy
